subject: College Athletics
Football
Heisman Trophy
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Cam Newton will likely face greater scrutiny after a series of allegations by Kenny Rogers, a recruiter with financial ties to an N.F.L. agent, that could affect Newton’s eligibility.
snippet: Quarterback Cam Newton will likely face greater scrutiny after a series of allegations by Kenny Rogers, a recruiter with financial ties to an N.F.L. agent, that could affect Newton’s eligibility.
